name: Goo Shift
description:
AWSD to move.

Mouse to Click on Object to Shift into.

When you are a object to can kill the baddies, but you have to be close enough.

Click to Attack (when Object)

Collett Goo Cell for Points.

All baddies must be dead before continuing into next zone.

Made in less than 48 Hours for #LD35

This is mostly a demo, I will keep working on it (lots to add and do) It will soon be on Steam!!
